verses.verse: As the <S%H354>deer<s%> <S%H6165>pants<s%> for the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H650>brooks,<s%> so my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6165>pants<s%> after <S%H430>you,<s%> God.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6770>thirsts<s%> for <S%H430>God,<s%> for the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%> When shall I <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God?<s%>
My <S%H1832>tears<s%> have been my <S%H3899>food<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> while they <S%H3117>continually<s%> <S%H559>ask<s%> <S%H430>me,<s%> "Where is your God?"

These things I <S%H2142>remember,<s%> and pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> within <S%H5674>me,<s%> how I used to go with the <S%H5519>crowd,<s%> and <S%H1718>led<s%> them to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>joy<s%> and <S%H8426>praise,<s%> a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> keeping a holy <S%H2287>day.<s%>

Why are you in <S%H7817>despair,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul?<s%> Why are you <S%H1993>disturbed<s%> within <S%H3176>me?<s%> Hope in <S%H430>God!<s%> For I shall still <S%H3034>praise<s%> him for the saving <S%H3444>help<s%> of his <S%H6440>presence.<s%>

My <S%H430>God,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is in <S%H7817>despair<s%> within <S%H2142>me.<s%> Therefore I remember you from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> the heights of <S%H2769>Hermon,<s%> from the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H4706>Mizar.<s%>

<S%H8415>Deep<s%> <S%H7121>calls<s%> to <S%H8415>deep<s%> at the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of your <S%H6794>waterfalls.<s%> All your <S%H4867>waves<s%> and your <S%H1530>billows<s%> have swept over <S%H5674>me.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6680>command<s%> his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime.<s%> In the <S%H3915>night<s%> his <S%H7892>song<s%> shall be with <S%H8605>me:<s%> a prayer to the <S%H410>God<s%> of my <S%H2416>life.<s%>

I will <S%H559>ask<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> my <S%H5553>rock,<s%> "Why have you <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H3212>me?<s%> Why do I go <S%H6937>mourning<s%> because of the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy?<s%>"
As with a <S%H7524>sword<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones,<s%> my <S%H6887>adversaries<s%> <S%H2778>reproach<s%> <S%H3117>me,<s%> while they continually <S%H559>ask<s%> <S%H430>me,<s%> "Where is your God?"

Why are you in <S%H7817>despair,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul?<s%> Why are you <S%H1993>disturbed<s%> within <S%H3176>me?<s%> Hope in <S%H430>God!<s%> For I shall still <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3444>him,<s%> the saving help of my <S%H6440>countenance,<s%> and my <S%H430>God.<s%>
